data.message: Its been really great I've met some great people I'm in touch with my grandkids my family and friends. Thank you so much.

replies.message: You're welcome, Linda! We're glad you are able to connect with your friends and family. -Hannah
Facebook Hannah, Why does Facebook censor Trump supporters?
Deborah Pollack ...Because FB is very liberal.  Say anything negative about the Democrats and they will suspend you.
Me gusta mucho el  fb por lacomunicacion
We have all kinds of people on here. Discrimination is illegal. Fb can get sued

When you create your account ,it says in the fine print everything you post pics and all , becomes property of fb , Mr zuckerberg, it's just like being in public, so just act accordingly, and appreciate the ability that fb does give us , just like everything in this life , you have to discern, what is correct and true , and what and if there is a hidden agenda
It has been pleasure to be part of FB, I have learned, and connected with friends old and new, shared memories with family members too. Thank you and MERRY CHRISTMAS 🎄🎄🙏🏼❤️
